text: Noraduz (or Noratus) is a site in the region of Gegharkunik in Armenia near Lake Sevan.The Armenian people from ancient to modern times - Page 45 by Richard G Hovannisian It was formed a church dedicated to Sainte-m√®re-de-Dieu (built in the ninth century), and an exceptional site of medieval tombs. The tombstones are called Khachkars. Noraduz is the most important place for Khachkars in Armenia. ==Related pages== *Noraduz cemetery *Khachkar == References == == Other websites == *Noraduz - Khachkars Field *Noraduz Village Category:History of Armenia
title: Noraduz
